entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing horizontal scrollbar in `ScrollView` #15953
  • Setting a PublishItemsOutputGroup's PublishProfilePath property leads to empty msi file #15952
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / Maui 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 AvoidConstArraysAnalyzer NullReferenceException #15948
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / MAUI 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 build error XAGJS7023 for Android #15947
  • The width of the picker cannot be filled on Windows #15941
  • Partial Repost: MainWindow freeze after workaround for "Maui partial UI freeze, typing to fast or method takes time to process." #15939
  • [iOS] Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor #15937

Closed

  • [Android] Grid with columns is not measured correctly. #15870
    Backlog
  • Errors: WinUI is causing errors.The Android version is not experiencing any issues.The permanent keyboard hiding feature is not working #15708
  • VS 2022 17.6.2 IOS Simulator/Device not displaying correctly #15487
  • Maui Connectivity Change from Online to Offline to Online Connectivity.NetworkAccess == Unknown on Windows 10 #15803
  • Picker selected item text color changes on mouse hover #15804
  • DatePicker Focused color not applied after date selection #15805
  • Blazor Hybrid: When debugging certain events in VisualStudio, e.g. Entry.TextChanged, breakpoints are not being hit and VisualStudio shows an error "No Compatible code running on the thread" #15923
  • Maui - iOS build fails when resizing png file #15751

PullRequests

Created

  • [X] Compiled Bindings to Array #15944
  • [release/8.0.1xxx-preview6] Merge net8.0 to preview6 #15943
  • [net7.0] Grid star expansion fixes #15938
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in Border #15946
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr7] [net7.0] Grid star expansion fixes #15942
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #15931
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15936
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/main@efa14e26 #15934
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Backport WinUI DeviceTest Fixes #15840
    area/testing

Updated

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview6] Update aspnet packages #15887
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Connect event to internal handler #15881
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
